backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access-controlled user profiles and an open contact inquiry submission system stored in memory.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend files to feature requirements and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and light/dark theming using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all public site routes wrapped in the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form component with validation, submission handling, and success/error messaging.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying college info, navigation links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile slide-out menu using TanStack Router and UI components.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a consistent layout including header, footer, and routed main content.
frontend/src/data/newsEventsSeed.ts: Defines news and event interfaces and provides hardcoded seed data for news items and upcoming events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Provides a hook to submit inquiries through the backend actor with loading and error state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining color themes, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero, history, mission, vision, and values sections using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Displays a hero section and a grid of academic program cards grouped by category. Uses predefined program data with icons, descriptions, and degree lists.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Renders admissions hero content, application steps, deadlines, and requirements using cards and buttons. Includes links for applying and scheduling visits.
frontend/src/pages/CampusLifePage.tsx: Shows campus life categories in card format, each with descriptions and highlight lists. Includes a hero section introducing campus life content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form and detailed contact information in cards, including address, phone, email, and office hours. Includes a hero section for the page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, stats, featured programs, and media. Pulls in news and events data and uses cards, badges, and buttons for layout.
frontend/src/pages/NewsEventsPage.tsx: React page rendering news items and upcoming events using seed data with cards and a themed layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state file defining current features, requirements, image needs, and metadata for the college website.
